        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_HTML_CLASS

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_HTML_CLASS
        Property that provides the value for the class CSS style property to be applied to elements in the table generated for the report. The value of this property will be used as the value for the class attribute of the <td> tag for the element when exported to HTML and/or the class attribute of the <span> or <div> tag for the element, when exported to XHTML/CSS.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_HTML_ID

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_HTML_ID
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
